title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The Chemical warfare attack in Syria and American drumbeats for another war, with Paul Craig Roberts. 

Dr. <!--more--> Paul Craig Roberts is one of today’s most progressive analytical and economic writers and commentators on the state of the nation: governmental dysfunction, political corruption, global and domestic economic threats, the war on terror, and the decline in human values in American society.
He was the chairman of the Institute for Political Economy and a former Assistant Secretary of Treasury during Reagan’s first term.
During his academic career he taught at many universities and held the William Simon Chair in Political Economy at the Center for Strategic and International Studies at Georgetown University.
Dr Roberts is a frequent contributor to Global Research, The Trends Journal, Counterpunch, and others.
He was an associate editor at the Wall Street Journal and has published many books and articles during the past 40 years, his latest being “How the Economy was Lost: The War of the Worlds”
